articles.title: Inside Mirakl's agentic commerce vision
articles.summary: Mirakl is pioneering "agentic commerce", a revolutionary approach that empowers businesses to create personalized, AI-driven shopping experiences. This innovative model enables companies to leverage data and automation to build tailored marketplaces and strengthen customer relationships. By adopting agentic commerce, businesses can stay ahead of the curve and thrive in a rapidly evolving retail landscape.

articles.title: Funding grants for new research into AI and mental health
articles.summary: Researchers have been awarded funding grants to explore the intersection of AI and mental health, aiming to develop innovative solutions for diagnosis, treatment, and support. This new research has the potential to revolutionize mental health care by leveraging AI's capabilities in data analysis and personalized interventions. The grants will enable scientists to investigate how AI can improve mental health outcomes and reduce the stigma surrounding mental illness.

articles.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with NORAD to bring AI-powered magic to the annual "NORAD Tracks Santa" event, enhancing the experience with interactive features and personalized responses. This collaboration will allow children to engage with Santa's journey in a more immersive and dynamic way, using OpenAI's conversational AI technology. The partnership aims to make the holiday season more enjoyable for kids worldwide, while showcasing the potential of AI in creating engaging experiences.

articles.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
articles.summary: Accenture has partnered with OpenAI to accelerate the adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) in enterprises, enabling businesses to harness the power of AI for innovation and growth. This collaboration aims to help companies overcome AI implementation challenges and unlock new opportunities. By combining Accenture's industry expertise with OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, enterprises can now more easily integrate AI into their operations and drive transformative results.

articles.title: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
articles.summary: OpenAI has taken an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, a move aimed at accelerating the adoption of artificial intelligence in enterprise settings. This partnership is expected to enable Thrive Holdings to leverage OpenAI's cutting-edge AI technologies, driving innovation and growth in the industry. The collaboration has the potential to revolutionize business operations by integrating AI solutions into various sectors.

articles.title: AlphaFold: Five years of impact
articles.summary: AlphaFold, a revolutionary AI-powered protein structure prediction tool, has made significant impacts in the scientific community over the past five years. By accurately predicting the 3D structures of proteins, AlphaFold has accelerated discoveries in fields such as medicine, biology, and biotechnology. Its innovative approach has opened up new avenues for disease research, drug development, and our understanding of the human body.

articles.title: Revealing a key protein behind heart disease
articles.summary: Researchers have identified a key protein that plays a crucial role in the development of heart disease, paving the way for potential new treatments. This breakthrough discovery could lead to more effective therapies and improved patient outcomes. By understanding the protein's function, scientists can now explore innovative ways to target and prevent heart disease.

articles.title: How we’re bringing AI image verification to the Gemini app
articles.summary: Gemini is integrating AI-powered image verification into its app, enabling users to verify the authenticity of images and detect potential deepfakes. This innovation aims to enhance trust and security within the platform, protecting users from misinformation and fraudulent activities. By leveraging AI technology, Gemini is setting a new standard for image verification in the digital space.

articles.title: Build with Nano Banana Pro, our Gemini 3 Pro Image model
articles.summary: Introducing the Nano Banana Pro, a cutting-edge model based on the Gemini 3 Pro Image, allowing developers to build innovative applications with advanced image capabilities. This new model enables the creation of more accurate and efficient image-based projects, driving progress in AI and machine learning. With Nano Banana Pro, users can unlock new possibilities in image recognition, generation, and manipulation.

articles.title: Introducing Nano Banana Pro
articles.summary: The Nano Banana Pro has been unveiled, boasting enhanced performance and features. This innovative device is set to revolutionize the tech industry with its cutting-edge capabilities. Further details are awaited, but the introduction of the Nano Banana Pro is generating significant buzz and excitement among tech enthusiasts.

articles.title: Transformers v5: Simple model definitions powering the AI ecosystem
articles.summary: The latest Transformers v5 release simplifies model definitions, making it easier for developers to integrate AI models into their applications. This update empowers the AI ecosystem by providing a more streamlined and accessible way to work with popular models like BERT and RoBERTa. By simplifying model definitions, Transformers v5 aims to accelerate AI innovation and adoption across various industries.

articles.title: Diffusers welcomes FLUX-2
articles.summary: Diffusers has introduced FLUX-2, a new addition to its platform, which is expected to bring innovative capabilities and enhancements. FLUX-2 aims to improve the overall user experience and performance, although specific details about its features and impact are not provided. This update is likely to be significant for users and developers working with Diffusers, potentially opening up new possibilities for creativity and productivity.

articles.title: Continuous batching from first principles
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced a new approach to continuous batching, a technique that enables more efficient processing of data in artificial intelligence models. This method, derived from first principles, has the potential to significantly improve the speed and performance of AI systems. By optimizing data batching, this innovation could lead to breakthroughs in areas like natural language processing and computer vision.

articles.title: 20x Faster TRL Fine-tuning with RapidFire AI
articles.summary: RapidFire AI has introduced a breakthrough technology that accelerates TRL (Transfer, Robustness, and Loss) fine-tuning by 20 times, significantly reducing training time and increasing model efficiency. This innovation has the potential to revolutionize AI development, enabling faster deployment of accurate and robust models. With RapidFire AI, researchers and developers can now fine-tune complex models in a fraction of the time, driving advancements in AI research and applications.

articles.title: Open ASR Leaderboard: Trends and Insights with New Multilingual & Long-Form Tracks
articles.summary: The Open ASR Leaderboard has introduced new multilingual and long-form tracks, providing a more comprehensive evaluation of automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems. This update enables researchers to assess ASR performance across diverse languages and longer audio recordings, driving innovation in speech-to-text technology. The expanded leaderboard is expected to foster advancements in ASR accuracy and accessibility for global users.

articles.title: Amazon launches Trainium3
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Trainium3, its third-generation AI training chip, which promises to significantly boost machine learning performance and efficiency. This new chip is designed to accelerate large-scale AI model training, enabling faster and more accurate processing of complex data sets. With Trainium3, Amazon aims to enhance its cloud computing capabilities and support the development of more sophisticated AI applications.

articles.title: OpenAI declares 'code red' as Google catches up in AI race
articles.summary: OpenAI has reportedly declared a "code red" alert as Google's AI advancements threaten to surpass its own capabilities, marking a significant shift in the AI race. Google's recent breakthroughs have narrowed the gap, prompting OpenAI to reassess its strategy and accelerate development. This sudden surge in competition may drive innovation and faster progress in the AI field.

articles.title: Qwen3-VL can scan two-hour videos and pinpoint nearly every detail
articles.summary: Qwen3-VL, a cutting-edge AI model, can scan two-hour videos and accurately identify nearly every detail, revolutionizing video analysis. This innovation enables rapid and precise detection of objects, actions, and events, making it a game-changer for applications like surveillance and content moderation. With Qwen3-VL, video analysis can be performed at unprecedented speeds and scales, unlocking new possibilities for industries and researchers.

articles.title: Mistral 3 family of models released
articles.summary: The Mistral 3 family of models has been released, offering a new generation of AI capabilities with improved performance and efficiency. This update is expected to enhance various applications, from natural language processing to computer vision, with more accurate and reliable results. The Mistral 3 models are poised to drive innovation in AI research and development, enabling new breakthroughs and advancements in the field.

articles.title: Ecosia: The greenest AI is here
articles.summary: Ecosia, a search engine that uses its profits to plant trees, has launched an AI model that combines sustainability with cutting-edge technology. This new AI is trained on renewable energy and promises to reduce carbon emissions, making it a game-changer for eco-friendly tech. By leveraging AI for good, Ecosia aims to further its mission of using technology to combat climate change.

articles.title: Apple Releases Open Weights Video Model
articles.summary: Apple has released its Open Weights video model, a significant advancement in AI-powered video processing that enables developers to create more efficient and accurate video analysis tools. This open-source model allows for greater customization and collaboration, potentially leading to breakthroughs in areas like object detection and tracking. By making its model publicly available, Apple is contributing to the growth of the AI research community and driving innovation in the field.

articles.title: What will enter the public domain in 2026?
articles.summary: In 2026, works published in 1950 will enter the public domain, making classic books, music, and films from that year available for free use and adaptation. This includes notable works such as George Orwell's "Shooting an Elephant" and C.S. Lewis's "The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe". The public domain expansion will enable new creative projects and accessibility to these iconic works.
